text:
The dysfunction in relationship with Max  is not my doing and hope you work to resolve.
Message 1971 of 4024
This is a very disappointing response
Sent:03/08/2024 at 11:17 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 11:21 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
Message 1972 of 4024
When I asked you yesterday for plan you responded I’ll connect with him and coordinate directly. I trusted you to do that. Adrian was not aware of
plan and clearly did not know. Why is that on me?
Next time I will be clear with Adrian and not leave up in the air.
Sent:03/08/2024 at 11:23 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 11:23 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
Message 1973 of 4024
See below. Adrian and I chatted. We talked about the entire day. I even gave you details of what he was doing now so you had to know we chatted.
We did have a time- it was noon. For you to say “I thought you talked with him” is frustrating, because I did. And then I told you I did. And then I
told you the results of that discussion. Please see below.
Options:
Adrian lied to you and said we did not chat
You decided I lied below and did not chat
I told you I would coordinate with him. I did coordinate with him. And then you decided I did not and stepped into the middle of it.
Sent:03/08/2024 at 11:24 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 11:39 AM)
Subject:Re: Abv. Running List: Friday 3/8
Message 1974 of 4024
See mail from earlier this AM where I go into great detail about my coordination with Adrian this AM
See other email about working together with Max so he has a strong father figure in his life.
Something really changed in you that you would work to destroy and blame instead of heal.
Sent:03/08/2024 at 11:27 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/08/2024 at 11:39 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
